revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - l2: => <#((á½€Î²Î¿Î»ÏŒÏ‚))=1#> l3: => <#ğ…µ=1/2#>*slanting-stroke* l4: => <#Ï„ÏÎ¯Ï„Î·Ï‚=3#> l7: => change Ï‚ in ÏÏ™Ï‚ to stigma

Entered greek text and Italian translation from transcoded edition. I had some trouble with entering line numbers in the translation, which I had to do from the XML, not the editor (if I did anything at all in the editor, it came back with an error in line 38, col. 14). I could not enter line numbers type, e.g, (((2))), but only ((2)). No line numbers showed up in the preview of the translation. The pap. editor was down today, evidently for upgrades: I wonder if this was the reason.XML Markup Change
